synopsis.text: Homura members, Rikio Kamamoto and Anna Kushina, find themselves in a dangerous chase, pursued by the Green Clan who seek Anna's powers for their own sinister intentions. Meanwhile, Kuroh Yatogami and Neko, members of the Silver Clan, have been tirelessly searching for their missing master, Shiro, since the School Island Incident that involved all four Kings. The paths of these two groups collide, leading to an unexpected alliance between the Silver Clan and the remnants of the Red Clan. Together, they strive to protect Anna and find Shiro, all while facing the looming threat of the Green Clan's power struggle against the Gold King's domain. K: Missing Kings follows the continuing story of a young boy entangled in a psychic war between seven kings, revealing each character's struggles after the losses of their respective Kings.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
